name: Overwrecked
description:
W A S D keys for movement on player1.

E key for pick up and use.

Q to drop items.

Up Right Down Left keys for movement on player2.

Keypad Enter for pick up and use.

Keypad 0 to drop items.

Repair the holes with hammer tool.

You can pump the water out.

Reload the cannon with cannon ball and fire it.

https://github.com/Enlades/PirateGuacamole  for the source.
